    State of an asset: pending, downloading, errored, etc.

      Asset can not be downloaded due to the Max Downloads Per Account rule.
      public static final int DOWNLOAD_DENIED_ACCOUNT
      Asset can not be downloaded due to the Max Downloads Per Account rule. Asset may start downloading once a current download on one of the user's devices is removed or expired.

      DOWNLOAD_DENIED_DRM 
      static int DOWNLOAD_DENIED_DRM
      Asset can not be downloaded due to a DRM license fetch that failed.
      public static final int DOWNLOAD_DENIED_DRM
      Asset can not be downloaded due to a DRM license fetch that failed. This state will only be set if the related setting has been set to error an asset based on DRM license fetch results. Marked as a permanent failure but the asset can be reset to retry the DRM license fetch again.
      See Also:
      ISettings.getErrorAssetOnDRMFail(), Constant Field Values

      DOWNLOAD_DENIED_MAX_DEVICE_DOWNLOADS 
      static int DOWNLOAD_DENIED_MAX_DEVICE_DOWNLOADS
      Asset can not be downloaded due to the Max Permitted Downloads On Device rule.
      public static final int DOWNLOAD_DENIED_MAX_DEVICE_DOWNLOADS
      Asset can not be downloaded due to the Max Permitted Downloads On Device rule. Asset will start downloading once a currently downloaded asset is deleted, expires or if the backplane value for the rule changes.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values
      DOWNLOAD_EXTERNAL_LOCK 
      static int DOWNLOAD_EXTERNAL_LOCK
      Asset can not be downloaded due to a recognised temporary blocked response during segment downloads.
      public static final int DOWNLOAD_EXTERNAL_LOCK
      Asset can not be downloaded due to a recognised temporary blocked response during segment downloads. Marked as a permanent failure to prevent automatic retries but can be reset to retry again.
      See Also:

      EARLY_DOWNLOADING 
      static int EARLY_DOWNLOADING
      A Segmented asset manifest has been parsed and is being processed.
      public static final int EARLY_DOWNLOADING
      A Segmented asset manifest has been parsed and is being processed. Some segments have started downloading prior to the processing being complete as this was the first item in the queue. Once complete, this state will change to DOWNLOADING.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

      Asset has expired; Virtuoso has deleted the asset from disk.
      public static final int EXPIRED
      Asset has expired; Virtuoso has deleted the asset from disk.

      MANIFEST_PARSE_PENDING 
      static int MANIFEST_PARSE_PENDING
      A Segmented asset is currently waiting for the manifest to be parsed and processed by the SDK prior to download being started.
      public static final int MANIFEST_PARSE_PENDING
      A Segmented asset is currently waiting for the manifest to be parsed and processed by the SDK prior to download being started. The SDK processes assets sequentially for efficiency.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

      A Segmented asset manifest is being downloaded, parsed, and processed to determine the segments which will be downloaded for offline playback.

      MANIFEST_PARSING_ERROR 
      static int MANIFEST_PARSING_ERROR
      Asset can not be downloaded as an issue was encountered while parsing the manifest which means it cannot be processed.
      public static final int MANIFEST_PARSING_ERROR
      Asset can not be downloaded as an issue was encountered while parsing the manifest which means it cannot be processed. Either the manifest is invalid
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values
      MANIFEST_REACHABILITY_ERROR 
      static int MANIFEST_REACHABILITY_ERROR
      Asset can not be downloaded.
      public static final int MANIFEST_REACHABILITY_ERROR
      Asset can not be downloaded. Either the top level manifest, or a submanifest which it references was not available to download when the SDK tried to parse the manifest. This indicates a permanent issue with accessing the manifest url, and not a temporal issue with connectivity.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values
